description: This dataset shows the Folkestone Park and Marine Reserve area. This site is currently the only designated marine protected area in Barbados. This Park spans several kilometres along the mid-west coast and currently has four well developed fringing reefs, several patch reefs and an offshore bank reef. There are currently four reserve zones: Two sport areas (Northern and Southern Watersports Zones) where motorized aquatic sports such as water skiing, jet skiing and para-sailing are permitted, a Scientific zone and a Recreation zone which permits snorkelling , swimming etc.
name: TM-BRB_Marine Protected Area - Folkestone Park and Marine Reserve - 1998 -1:10000
